name: Ninja Theif
description:
Use Arrow  keys to move and Space bar to jump.

Runs on google chrome/google.

No support for Safari

This is a platformer game in which you have to avoid security and steal valubles.

It is made in Java Script on mac 13' but does run on some phones and tablets:

Works  on the following devices:

iPad 9th generation : landscape,  

Tested on Macbook air 13'  M1 2020, and will work on most other laptops, 

Kindle fire hdx,

Nexus 10 : landscape,

iPad Air : landscape,

iPad Mini: landscape,

iPad : landscape,

iPad Pro,

Surface Pro 7,

Next Hub Max,

Other devices with screen ratio close to 1080 : 720
